languages.text: "Нет, господин дознаватель. Опасные для порядка нарушения я устраню сам, а более мелкие недостойны вашего внимания".
"No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder. As for minor infractions — you and I both have better things to do."
languages.original_text: "Нет, господин дознаватель. Опасные для порядка нарушения я устраню сам, а более мелкие недостойны вашего внимания".

traits.locale_text: "No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder, but more minor infractions are not worthy of your attention."
"No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder, but more minor infractions are not worthy of your attention."
"No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder, but more minor infractions are not worthy of your attention."
"No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder. As for minor infractions — you and I both have better things to do."
"No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder. As for minor infractions — you and I both have better things to do."

languages.text: 「いいえ、インテロゲイター殿。混乱につながるような違反には、私が対処します。些細な違反については…あなたも私も、他にやるべきことがあるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder. As for minor infractions — you and I both have better things to do."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、インテロゲイター殿。混乱につながるような違反には、私が対処します。些細な違反については…あなたも私も、他にやるべきことがあるでしょう」

languages.text: "Nein, Meister Interrogator. Ich kümmere mich um sämtliche Verstöße, die zu Unordnung führen könnten. Was kleinere Verstöße angeht ... da haben wir beide Besseres zu tun."
languages.original_text: "No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder. As for minor infractions — you and I both have better things to do."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Meister Interrogator. Ich kümmere mich um sämtliche Verstöße, die zu Unordnung führen könnten. Was kleinere Verstöße angeht ... da haben wir beide Besseres zu tun."

languages.text: « Non, maître interrogateur. Je me tiens prêt à juger toute transgression susceptible de menacer l'ordre, mais s'il s'agit d'infractions mineures... eh bien, nous avons tous les deux mieux à faire. »
languages.original_text: "No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder. As for minor infractions — you and I both have better things to do."

traits.locale_text: « Non, maître interrogateur. Je me tiens prêt à juger toute transgression susceptible de menacer l'ordre, mais s'il s'agit d'infractions mineures... eh bien, nous avons tous les deux mieux à faire. »

languages.text: «No, maestro interrogador. Me ocuparé de cualquier transgresión que amenace con alterar el orden. En cuanto a las faltas leves, tanto usted como yo tenemos cosas mejores que hacer».
languages.original_text: "No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder. As for minor infractions — you and I both have better things to do."

traits.locale_text: «No, maestro interrogador. Me ocuparé de cualquier transgresión que amenace con alterar el orden. En cuanto a las faltas leves, tanto usted como yo tenemos cosas mejores que hacer».

languages.text: “不，审讯官大师，我关注的是可能会导致扰乱秩序的违规行为。至于小小的违纪行为，我相信你我都有更重要的事情要做。”
languages.original_text: "No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder. As for minor infractions — you and I both have better things to do."

traits.locale_text: “不，审讯官大师，我关注的是可能会导致扰乱秩序的违规行为。至于小小的违纪行为，我相信你我都有更重要的事情要做。”

languages.text: "Hayır Üstat Sorgucu. Kargaşaya yol açabilecek herhangi bir ihlali bizzat ele alacağım. Ufak ihlallere gelirsek... İkimizin de daha önemli işleri var bence."
languages.original_text: "No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder. As for minor infractions — you and I both have better things to do."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır Üstat Sorgucu. Kargaşaya yol açabilecek herhangi bir ihlali bizzat ele alacağım. Ufak ihlallere gelirsek... İkimizin de daha önemli işleri var bence."

languages.original_text: "No, Master Interrogator. I will deal with any violations that could lead to disorder. As for minor infractions — you and I both have better things to do."
